item.title: The bird on the cover of "Learning CFEngine 3"
item.description: A lot of people have asked me about the bird on the cover of the book, and I had to admit I didn't know. Unfortunately, the book (even in the print version) does not include a description of the cover in the Colophon, like most other O'Reilly books. But today I got the information directly from Karen Montgomery at O'Reilly, who designed the cover: The bird is aÂ Tui, a kind of bird that leaves in New Zealand, also known as a Parson Bird.
